title: Large furnished Bedroom w/bath available
posting_body: A large furnished bedroom will be available in a quite house with two other people in a nice neighborhood.
You would have your own large bedroom, a large walk-in closet, and a large bathroom all to yourself.
You would share the kitchen and family room with the other two tenants.
The house has a small but complete kitchen, a "family room" no tv, an indoor washer/dryer, and 1 parking space per tenant.
It is in a lovely quiet neighborhood.
If you are looking for a comfortable place, with nice and considerate people that you won't see much of, this might be the place you are looking for.
The neighbor has chickens that are rather loud in the morning and can definitely be heard from your room.
If you are interested please text
